title: 22 smugglers held with 1,500 sacks of cement
body: Bangladesh Navy has detained 22 alleged smugglers and seized two engine-run boats carrying 1,500 sacks of cement near Saint Martin's Island, said a BN press release yesterday. The operation took place on Tuesday night during a patrol in the Bay of Bengal. A naval ship, Pratyasha, spotted the two wooden boats about 36.5 miles west of the island. The boats attempted to flee but were intercepted.
